upcomingEvents.title: Community Food Drive
upcomingEvents.description: Join us as we collect food donations for local families in need. All are welcome to donate or volunteer.

upcomingEvents.title: New Member Orientation
upcomingEvents.description: Learn more about Fortress Church, our mission, and how to get involved. Lunch provided.

upcomingEvents.title: Easter Celebration
upcomingEvents.description: Join us for a special Easter service celebrating the resurrection of Christ. Special music and message.
